title: Avenue Supermar Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 17,612.62 crore, up 13.15% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Avenue Supermarts are:Net Sales at Rs 17,612.62 crore in December 2025 up 13.15% from Rs. 15,565.23 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 923.05 crore in December 2025 up 17.64% from Rs. 784.65 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 1,511.04 crore in December 2025 up 18.82% from Rs. 1,271.66 crore in December 2024. Avenue Supermar EPS has increased to Rs. 14.19 in December 2025 from Rs. 12.06 in December 2024. Avenue Supermar shares closed at 3,832.50 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given -4.46% returns over the last 6 months and 9.27% over the last 12 months.
